   contain the root `toctree` directive.

PyComplexHeatmap
======================================
`PyComplexHeatmap <https://github.com/DingWB/PyComplexHeatmap>`_ is a python package to plot complex heatmap (clustermap) with biological data.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   get_started
   clustermap
   dotHeatmap
   oncoPrint
   advanced_usage
   more_examples
   modify_labels
   gallery
   modules
   citation

Credits and Thanks
========================
The package was provided by Wubin Ding.
